metadata.address: 251 E Huron St, Chicago, IL 60611, USA
metadata.name: Pizza Studio

reviews.text: Fast, made to order pizza topped with your choice of fresh, healthy fruits, vegetables, and vegan alternatives. 5 varieties of extra thin pizza from firecracker hot, gluten free and herb. Ready in minutes and served hot.
I love this place!!!! Best crust ever!! Firecracker.  Please reopen more stores! I miss my once a week treat! Staff is amazing.

Quick pizza on your choice of crusts, with multiple fresh and tasty toppings. The salad offerings are also quite reasonable. Also has a good selection of fresh juices or iced tea beverages. It's not the best pizza in town but for a made-to-order pizza in just a few minutes, you can't go wrong.
Great custom pizzas made to order, hot and fast!

Loved this place, even though in northwestern hospital.

Pizza comes out piping hot and exactly as you like. All their toppings and ingredients are...

It would have gotten 5 stars but there were two discrepancies (in my opinion). 

First one (oxymoron): Percy was an awesome chef! Ha! However he told me...

Props to Northwestern for acquiring such an affordable, satiating, and delicious lunch option for their patients, families, and employees!! 
A Chipotle...
